greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array read by rows in which row n lists the divisors of n, but if n is a square then the square root of n appears twice.
comment: Row n has length A161841(n). Row sums give A060866. - _Omar E. Pol_, Jan 06 2014
link: Omar E. Pol, Determinacion geometrica de los numeros primos y perfectos
Omar E. Pol, Illustration: Divisors and pi(x)
mathematica: dsr[n_]:=If[IntegerQ[Sqrt[n]],Sort[Join[{Sqrt[n]},Divisors[n]]],Divisors[ n]]; Array[ dsr,30]//Flatten (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 27 2020 *)
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jun 23 2009
